channel.title: Irish Marxist Review – Issues
channel.description: Notifies when a new Irish Marxist Review issue is published.

item.title: Vol. 13 No. 37 (2024): Irish Marxist Review, Volume 13 Issue 37
item.description:
Vol. 13 No. 37 (2024): Irish Marxist Review, Volume 13 Issue 37

Published: 2024-12-01

About

  • Editorial – Brian O'Boyle

Articles

  • The Struggle for Liberation in Palestine An interview with Richard Boyd-Barrett – Brian O'Boyle
  • Western Imperialism and its Zionist Enforcer – Brian O'Boyle
  • The Growing Jewish Anti-Zionist Movement – Becca Bor
  • Lenin, Imperialism, and Revolutionary Struggles – Paul Le Blanc
  • Regressive and Unstable – Stormont Returns to Failure – Michael Jackson
  • The Careless Society: Holborow on Gender, Care and Homes in Modern Capitalism Sinéad Kennedy – Mark Anderson
  • The Contradictions of Home Life in Capitalism – Marnie Holborow

Book Reviews

  • Book Reviews – Cailín McCaffery, Darryl Horan, Emma Hendrick
